charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Volo
and Giratina staring at some ruins.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_0300_:
You must have traveled quite a ways to
get here.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_0500_:
Well...the ones here are just replicas
of those from other regions, but if you’re
just curious about history, they’ll suffice.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_0700_:
Whenever we visit these ruins, Giratina
can’t seem to settle down.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_0800_:
Parts of these ruins resemble those in the
Hisui region related to Arceus myths.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_0900_:
Do you know why Giratina reacts so
strongly to Arceus?
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_1000_:
You have no clue, do you? Allow me
to explain.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_1100_:
Giratina was born along with Dialga and
Palkia, as their equal.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_1200_:
However, because Giratina brandished
power as it pleased, Arceus banished it
to the reverse side of our world.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_1300_:
I suppose its hatred for Arceus lingers
even to this day.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_1400_:
The statue of what appeared to be
Giratina, in the Hisui region ruins,
crumbled.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_1500_:
I suppose at some point, everyone forgot
Giratina even existed.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_1600_:
Nonetheless, it still hopes to challenge
Arceus again, given the opportunity.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_1800_:
It will keep trying, over and over,
despite being forgotten.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_0401_2000_: So you’ll be Giratina’s ally, then?
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_0402_2200_:
Are you saying you approve of what
Giratina’s done?
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_2300_:
Or...were those words not just for
Giratina, perhaps?
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_2400_: You are too soft for your own good.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_2500_: Giratina and I certainly are persistent.
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_2600_: Even if others forget about us...
charaepi_ch0359_00_volo2/2301_1201_2700_:
we’ll keep following where our curiosity
leads—and continue on, despite the
struggle!
